content: Is the reference server down? I can't seem to access it at: http://hapi.fhir.org
@James Agnew @Mark Iantorno
It seems to be up now :) Edit: nvm
The public reference HAPI server times out on searches, eg http://hapi.fhir.org/baseR4/Condition?patient.identifier=123 - a restart may be desirable .. @James Agnew

FYI - We're out temporarily but should be back soon with a more stable
server. Sorry about this...
It's back, but with the same issue as before...
what IP are you getting from DNS?

Actually my statement above was about HAPI, not about test,fhir.org.. Lots of things work on HAPI, but something is awry with search or the search indexes. hapi.fhir.org/baseR4/Condition?patient.identifier=123 still fails.

{
"resourceType": "OperationOutcome",
"text": {
"status": "generated",
"div": "<div xmlns=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml\"><h1>Operation Outcome</h1><table border=\"0\"><tr><td style=\"font-weight: bold;\">ERROR</td><td>[]</td><td><pre>ERROR: canceling statement due to user request</pre></td>\n\t\t\t</tr>\n\t\t</table>\n\t</div>"
},
"issue": [ {
"severity": "error",
"code": "processing",
"diagnostics": "ERROR: canceling statement due to user request"
} ]
}

I'm still having the same error when searching: {'resourceType': 'OperationOutcome', 'text': {'status': 'generated', 'div': '<div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><h1>Operation Outcome</h1><table border="0"><tr><td style="font-weight: bold;">ERROR</td><td>[]</td><td><pre>ERROR: canceling statement due to user request</pre></td> </tr> </table> </div>'}, 'issue': [{'severity': 'error', 'code': 'processing', 'diagnostics': 'ERROR: canceling statement due to user request'}]}
@James Agnew
